snippet: The United States open team at the World Mind Sports Games in Lille, France, in August will be Nick Nickell-Ralph Katz, Bob Hamman-Zia Mahmood and Jeff Meckstroth-Eric Rodwell.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played in the trial to select the United States open team for the World Mind Sports Games.
lead_paragraph: The United States open team at the World Mind Sports Games in Lille, France, in August will be Nick Nickell-Ralph Katz, Bob Hamman-Zia Mahmood and Jeff Meckstroth-Eric Rodwell.

headline.seo: Bridge — U.S. Team Set for World Mind Sports Games
headline.main: U.S. Team Set for World Mind Sports Games
